title: Chinese Consulate Collection: China Up Close
abstract: High drama and high action feature films from China.
description: Enjoy some high drama and high action with this range of feature-length films from the Chinese Consulate Collection. The films in this program have been the subject of a research project undertaken in conjunction with the University of Melbourne. We present some of these titles as part of our 'China Up Close' season.
